description: TalosUpgrade is the Schema for the talosupgrades API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: TalosUpgradeSpec defines the desired state of TalosUpgrade

healthChecks.description: HealthChecks defines a list of CEL-based health checks to perform before each node upgrade

items.description: HealthCheck defines a CEL-based health check

apiVersion.description: APIVersion of the resource to check

description.description: Description of what this check validates (for status/logging)

expr.description:
CEL expression that must evaluate to true for the check to pass
The resource object is available as 'object' and status as 'status'

kind.description: Kind of the resource to check

name.description: Name of the specific resource (optional, if empty checks all resources of this kind)

namespace.description: Namespace of the resource (optional, for namespaced resources)

debug.description: Debug enables debug mode for the upgrade

force.description: Force the upgrade (skip checks on etcd health and members)

placement.description:
Placement controls how strictly upgrade jobs avoid the target node
hard: required avoidance (job will fail if can't avoid target node)
soft: preferred avoidance (job prefers to avoid but can run on target node)

rebootMode.description: RebootMode select the reboot mode during upgrade

stage.description: Stage the upgrade to perform it after a reboot

timeout.description: Timeout for the per-node talosctl upgrade command

talos.description: Talos specifies the talos configuration for upgrade operations

version.description: Version is the target Talos version to upgrade to (e.g., "v1.11.0")

talosctl.description: Talosctl specifies the talosctl configuration for upgrade operations

image.description: Image specifies the talosctl container image

pullPolicy.description: PullPolicy describes a policy for if/when to pull a container image

repository.description: Repository is the talosctl container image repository

tag.description:
Tag is the talosctl container image tag
If not specified, defaults to the target version

status.description: TalosUpgradeStatus defines the observed state of TalosUpgrade

completedNodes.description: CompletedNodes are nodes that have been successfully upgraded

currentNode.description: CurrentNode is the node currently being upgraded

failedNodes.description: FailedNodes are nodes that failed to upgrade

items.description: NodeUpgradeStatus tracks the upgrade status of individual nodes

jobName.description: JobName is the name of the job handling this node's upgrade

lastError.description: LastError contains the last error message

nodeName.description: NodeName is the name of the node

retries.description: Retries is the number of times upgrade was attempted

lastUpdated.description: LastUpdated timestamp of last status update

message.description: Message provides details about the current state

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration reflects the generation of the most recently observed spec

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of the upgrade
